db:abstract.db:para: Minibrowser example demonstrates how to use the Qt WebView module with Qt Quick.

db:article.db:para: Minibrowser uses Qt Quick Controls and Qt WebView to provide basic browsing experience. Besides the addressbar for the URL, it has a couple of controls to navigate through the browsing history.

db:note.db:para: When using the Qt WebView module it is necessary to call QtWebView::initialize() immediately before creating the QGuiApplication instance. Calling QtWebView::initialize() will ensure that the necessary pre-setup steps are run.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
